name: SendSpark, Inc.
description: Developer of a video outreach platform designed to connect and engage with customers. The company's platform features tools to record videos from a browser, customize landing pages, share via email or a public uniform resource locator, and track analytics, enabling businesses to accelerate and develop connections with their customers.
one_liner: Developer of a video outreach platform designed to connect and engage with customers. The company's platform features tools to record videos from a browser, customize landing pages, share via email or a public uniform resource locator, and track analytics, enabling businesses to accelerate and develop connections with their customers.
